State

data class State : OwnableState


Constructors

Properties

contract val contract: CommercialPaper

Contract by which the state belongs
faceValue val faceValue: Amount<Currency>
issuance val issuance: PartyAndReference
maturityDate val maturityDate: Instant
notary val notary: Party

Identity of the notary that ensures this state is not used as an input to a transaction more than once
owner val owner: PublicKey

There must be a MoveCommand signed by this key to claim the amount
